main event: On 8 April 1961, a UFO was observed in the vicinity of Canton, Ohio, showing rapid movements and hovering characteristics, with radar tracking confirming the sighting.
interesting points: The object displayed rapid up and down movements and erratic maneuvers while hovering., The object would fade away and reappear at different locations., It emitted no sound or exhaust trail., A pilot confirmed observing the object during the incident., The sighting lasted for approximately 30 minutes.
witness description: The witness is a 20-year-old student at Purdue University, majoring in Electrical Engineering, with prior training in electronics while serving in the U.S. Navy.
